about_the_game:
You are managing a shop with all the good things that comes with it.

The Vision: Anything that taint the fun have no place here.

A shop life simulator, From owning a small room above the store to selling exclusive products as the highest rated shop, or scratch lottery tickets to try your luck to win big, Manage alone or with friends, in a complete shop simulation.


Buy & Sell scratch tickets and try your luck at winning those prizes




Only if you choose to remain open and go through the night. There is an special attention to the nights to have their own different vibe than days.


Order and stock products, Hire staff, and organize your shelves for fast shopping by customers.




You start small, you can grow big, physically and spiritually. Buy places and storage locations to increase your fame and your customers.




Be on the lookout to hire the best staff members, each day the recruit page is updated with new people and a new set of skills.


Planned features, In Priority Order:
  • A small and cozy room / home above the store.
  • Staff Room/s
Planned features, In no Particular Order:
  • Separate shops for each player in the lobby, either cozy shops running businesses or ultimate showdown to see who's the best shop that gets more customers!
  • Weather changes and their effect on your shop.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
